about_the_game:
Synopsis

　Haru Sakuragi is a girl who loves ghosts.

　One day, she decides she wants to actually visit a haunted place, and decides to go to a haunted place she found on the Internet.
　It is a junior high school that was closed down a few years ago and is said to be haunted by mysterious psychic phenomena.
　Haru heads to the abandoned school to investigate and see if the rumors are true.

About The Game

　A 3D first-person horror game set in an abandoned middle school.

　The game is a 3D first-person horror game set in an abandoned junior high school.

　・Explore the school by collecting items and solving multiple gimmicks.
Collect notes left by students and investigate what happened to them.
　・Run, hide, and sometimes fight against the oncoming enemies.
　・Play time: 1~2 hours

Controls

　Movement : W A S D key

　Crouching : Ctrl key
　Sprint : Shift key
　Interacting : F key
　Putting away items in hand : X key
　Inventory : TAB key
